option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: @echo on setlocal call pnpm build powershell -NoProfile -Command "Expand-Archive -Path 'echoes_unheard.zip' -DestinationPath 'echoes_unheard' -Force" rmdir /S /Q "D:\LiteLoaderQQNT\plugins\echoes_unheard" move /Y "D:\webdev\LiteLoaderQQNT-Echoes-Unheard\echoes_unheard" "D:\LiteLoaderQQNT\plugins" cd /d "C:\Program Files\Tencent\QQNT" call debug.cmd pause
